Posts.Content: Oh I do understand. My urologist who found my bladder cancer and did turbt left the practice and moved to another state. He was the kindest,caring dr whom I had utmost faith in. He understood my fear and was always ready to listen. Starting over with new dr was hard for me. 3 months after my turbt I had to have colon resection. It has been such a rollercoaster ride for me.
Posts.Title: New column: "Grieving the Loss of Your Physician"
